name: ChronicMyeloidLeukemia
title: Chronic Myeloid Leukemia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts related to diagnostic coding of a diagnosis of Chronic Myeloid Leukemia (CML).),(Data Element Scope: This value set would use the Diagnosis QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains concepts related to diagnoses of CML that is BCR-ABL positive.),(Exclusion Criteria: Those codes not meeting inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Chronic myeloid leukemia, BCR/ABL-positive, not having achieved remission
Chronic myeloid leukemia, BCR/ABL-positive, in remission
Chronic myeloid leukemia, BCR/ABL-positive, in relapse
